wikipedia_page.main: Lee Mark Grant (born 31 December 1985) is an English former footballer who played as a defender. He played for York City, Aston Villa and Southport.

response: Lee Grant is an American actress.
Lee Grant may also refer to:
*Lee Grant (footballer, born 1983), English football player who plays for Manchester United
*Lee Grant (footballer, born 1985), English footballer who played for Aston Villa
*Lee Grant (New Zealand actress) (1931–2016), English-born New Zealand actress and singer
* Mr. Lee Grant, New Zealand pop star
